name: maid
description: Fast, accurate Mermaid diagram validator (CLI) with clear diagnostics.

scripts.test:errors:sequence: npm run build && node scripts/test-errors.js sequence
scripts.test:errors:flowchart: npm run build && node scripts/test-errors.js flowchart
scripts.test:errors:pie: npm run build && node scripts/test-errors.js pie
scripts.test:errors:all: npm run build && node scripts/test-errors.js all
scripts.ci:test: npm run build && node scripts/test-errors.js all && node scripts/compare-linters.js flowchart && node scripts/compare-linters.js pie && node scripts/compare-linters.js sequence
scripts.lint:valid: for file in test-fixtures/flowchart/valid/*.mmd; do node out/cli.js "$file" || exit 1; done
scripts.lint:invalid: for file in test-fixtures/flowchart/invalid/*.mmd; do node out/cli.js "$file" 2>/dev/null && exit 1 || true; done
scripts.generate:previews: node scripts/generate-preview.js flowchart && node scripts/generate-invalid-preview.js flowchart && node scripts/generate-preview.js pie && node scripts/generate-invalid-preview.js pie && node scripts/generate-preview.js sequence && node scripts/generate-invalid-preview.js sequence
scripts.generate:valid: node scripts/generate-preview.js flowchart && node scripts/generate-preview.js pie && node scripts/generate-preview.js sequence
scripts.generate:invalid: node scripts/generate-invalid-preview.js flowchart && node scripts/generate-invalid-preview.js pie && node scripts/generate-invalid-preview.js sequence
scripts.ci:previews:
npm run build && npm run generate:previews && git update-index -q --refresh && git diff --exit-code || (echo '
Preview files are outdated. Run: npm run generate:previews' && exit 1)

author: Probelabs
